version_description:
Bug fix with game ending on background.
Performance Improvements
Improved experience for new iPhone Xs and iPhone Xr

Improved performance on the new iPhone Xs and Xr
Updated look and feel
Upgraded stats tracking

Optimize for IPhone XS,XR
Bug Fixes

- improved performance for older devices
- fixed bugs with gameplay controls

Added difficulty slider to settings menu!
Improved user experience!
Fixed bugs and improved performance!

- bug fixes and performance improvements
- Improved controls to minimize accidental mistakes

- Fixed timer bug
- Updated UI
- Revised controls for better functionality

New Daily Challenge Mode!
Bug Fixes.

- Fixed bug that starts daily challenges automatically
- Improved gameplay and UI

Dear Sudoku players,
This update includes bug fixes ad UI optimization.
Thank you for choosing Sudoku Brain Games, Please share with your friends!
